info.title: SAIDATA API Documentation
info.description: API Documentation untuk Sistem Informasi Akademik FMIPA

post.description: Authenticate user with campus SSO credentials and receive JWT tokens

items.example: The password must be at least 6 characters.

post.description: Invalidate JWT token and clear refresh token
Get a new access token using refresh token from cookie (token rotation enabled)

Set-Cookie.description: New HTTP-only refresh token cookie (token rotation)
Clears the invalid refresh token cookie

post.description: Create a new form with fields structure. Backend will generate MongoDB ObjectId and field IDs automatically.

options.description: Options for select, radio, checkbox fields

get.description: Retrieve a specific form by MongoDB ObjectId

put.description: Update an existing form. Backend will preserve existing field IDs and generate new IDs for new fields.

fields.description: Fields array. Include 'id' for existing fields to preserve them, omit 'id' for new fields.

increment_version.description: Set to true to create new version (recommended when changing fields structure)

change_summary.example: Updated question 3, added new email field

delete.description: Permanently delete a form. Only forms with zero submissions can be deleted.

message.example: Cannot delete form with existing submissions

patch.description: Toggle form between active and inactive status. Inactive forms cannot receive new submissions.

get.description: Retrieve all version history of a form
Retrieve a specific version of a form from history

get.summary: Get all submissions for a form
get.description: Retrieve all submissions for a specific form with submitter details

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the form (24 character hex string)

get.summary: Get submission by ID with payload
get.description: Retrieve a specific submission with its payload, form details, and submitter information

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the submission (24 character hex string)

put.description: Update a draft submission. Completed submissions cannot be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the submission (24 character hex string)

delete.description: Delete a submission and its associated payload

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the submission (24 character hex string)

post.description: Submit a new response to a form. Creates both submission record and payload.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the form (24 character hex string)

answers.description: Key-value pairs of field IDs and their answers

message.example: This form is no longer active

get.summary: Get dynamic menu based on user's faculty, department, and study program
get.description: Mengambil data menu dinamis berdasarkan fakultas, jurusan, dan program studi pengguna yang sedang login.
Retrieve all menu items filtered by user's admin scope. Admin Univ can see universitas & update_data, Admin Fakultas can see their faculty menus, Admin Jurusan can see their department menus.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Filter by scope (universitas, fakultas, jurusan, update_data)

post.description: Create a new menu item with validation rules based on level and scope. Update Data scope can only have Level 2 forms. Only Level 1 can have icons.

400.description: Validation error or invalid business rule

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to create in this scope

get.description: Retrieve a specific menu item with its parent and children relationships

put.description: Update an existing menu item. Only name, icon (level 1 only), route, form_id, is_active, and order can be updated.

requestBody.description: Menu fields to update (partial update allowed)

400.description: Validation error or invalid business rule

delete.description: Delete a menu item and all its children recursively (cascade delete). This is a permanent operation.

post.description: Bulk update menu order. Only menus that the user has authorization to manage will be updated.

requestBody.description: Array of menus with new order values

get.summary: Get user profile by user ID
get.description: Retrieve profile for a specific user

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token in format: Bearer {token}

tags.name: Menu Management
tags.description: API endpoints for managing hierarchical menu system with role-based access control
